whiteboard.translation[0].definitions[0]: a large board with a white smooth surface that you can write on, used, for example, in rooms where classes are taught
whiteboard.translation[1].definitions[0]: a large white board on which you write information that you are presenting to a group of people
whiteboard.translation[1].definitions[1]: an area on a computer screen that looks like a white board, and that can be used by several people at different computers to exchange information, for example in a teleconference
